_header: As I me walked this ender day
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 192.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, dialogue, with Christ; dialogues, Virgin and Christ
_description: Song of the Virgin Mary talking to her Child — five quatrains including refrain ‘a lone’ (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘Alone alone alone alone alone / Here I sytt alone alas alone’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
As I me walkyd this endurs dayTo þe grene wode for to
                    play…
